column4: lets try..i have not been successful on mine, but you can try some of these commands
what does ifconfig -a  tells you about your nic interfaces
is eth0 mapped to your wifi or is that a separate nic card ?
even notebooks have nic cards plus wifi cads
is there a light indicator on your embedded wifi card that tells you it is active?
yes, but the light is off
look around for a switch to turn in on...or keyboard combo perhaps..
I just push the button, but is not switching
next is check with   dmesg|grep eth0
but I cant switch the light on
oh there is a switch, you may need to pull out your handy manual and read it..lolz
but when I work with windows, I just push the switch
see the dmesg if it detected it..
